title: ENH: Categorical feature not working with `shap.plots.scatter`
body:
### Issue Description

When having a categorical feature, the scatter plot fails:
```
---------------------------------------------------------------------------
TypeError                                 Traceback (most recent call last)
File [c:\users\onga1340\main\programs\adex_app\adex\utils.py:156](file:///C:/users/onga1340/main/programs/adex_app/adex/utils.py:156), in plot_shap(adex_object, explanation, plot, max_scatter)
    155 try:
--> 156     shap.plots.scatter(explanation[:,feature,itarget], color=explanation[:,feature,itarget])
    157 except TypeError:

File [c:\ProgramData\Miniconda3\envs\adex310\lib\site-packages\shap\plots\_scatter.py:195](file:///C:/ProgramData/Miniconda3/envs/adex310/lib/site-packages/shap/plots/_scatter.py:195), in scatter(shap_values, color, hist, axis_color, cmap, dot_size, x_jitter, alpha, title, xmin, xmax, ymin, ymax, overlay, ax, ylabel, show)
    194 for i in range(1,len(vals)):
--> 195     d = vals[i] - vals[i-1]
    196     if d > 1e-8 and d < min_dist:

TypeError: unsupported operand type(s) for -: 'str' and 'str'

During handling of the above exception, another exception occurred:

TypeError                                 Traceback (most recent call last)
Cell In[8], line 1
----> 1 plot_shap(ao, explanation=e, plot=['scatter'], max_scatter=None)
      2 # NOTE: still not working for categorical variables

File [c:\users\onga1340\main\programs\adex_app\adex\utils.py:158](file:///C:/users/onga1340/main/programs/adex_app/adex/utils.py:158), in plot_shap(adex_object, explanation, plot, max_scatter)
    156             shap.plots.scatter(explanation[:,feature,itarget], color=explanation[:,feature,itarget])
    157         except TypeError:
--> 158             shap.plots.scatter(explanation[:,feature,itarget], color="#1E88E5")
    159             #pass # TODO: can not print categorical data!
    161 if 'summary_bar_plotly' in plot:

File [c:\ProgramData\Miniconda3\envs\adex310\lib\site-packages\shap\plots\_scatter.py:195](file:///C:/ProgramData/Miniconda3/envs/adex310/lib/site-packages/shap/plots/_scatter.py:195), in scatter(shap_values, color, hist, axis_color, cmap, dot_size, x_jitter, alpha, title, xmin, xmax, ymin, ymax, overlay, ax, ylabel, show)
    193 min_dist = np.inf
    194 for i in range(1,len(vals)):
--> 195     d = vals[i] - vals[i-1]
    196     if d > 1e-8 and d < min_dist:
    197         min_dist = d

TypeError: unsupported operand type(s) for -: 'str' and 'str'
```
The problem is that `vals` (i.e., the feature array) is of dtype object.

### Minimal Reproducible Example

```python
# X is a DataFrame with categorical column "catfeature"
explanation = explainer(X)
shap.plots.scatter(explanation[:,catfeature])
```


### Expected Behavior

Quick solution: raise a `NotImplementedError` if the vector is of dtype == object
Long solution: map each feature level to a number, execute the code, show the levels on the x-axis of the plot.

### Bug report checklist

- [X] I'd be interested in making a PR to fix this bug

### Installed Versions

0.42.1
